description:
Neighbors 4 Neighbors is a non-profit organization originally created in 1992 in the aftermath of Hurricane Andrew by WFOR-TV, CBS4. As South Florida recovered, CBS4 management opted to continue Neighbors as part of its community service program. Neighbors became an important resource for all individuals and families facing every day crises. Uses social media, internet, and television to communicate unique needs. Provides extensive referral network.

###MON###
name: NEIGHBORS 4 NEIGHBORS
